results.title: Use of metformin in patients who require intravascular administration of a contrast agent.
results.text_hl: Due to its properties, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is used in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Glucose_Galactose_Malabsorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562602 @@@carbohydrate disorders@@@ (in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@) and in @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance syndromes@@@ (including @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@).

citations.NLM: Rokicka D, Wróbel M, Stołtny D, Strojek K. Use of metformin in patients who require intravascular administration of a contrast agent. Endokrynol Pol. 2022;73(6):913-916. PMID: 36519659
